RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 106. Allowance Purse 32500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 12 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Al lowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOTARY settled in the five path down the backstretch, picked up momentum quickly entering the far turn, made the lead two wide before the five sixteenths pole, was headed briefly in upper stretch then fought back gamely to prove best under left handed urging along the inside. STAR HAWK settled in the four path early, closed rapidly three wide through the far turn, made the lead briefly at the top of the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. BEER CHASER sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set the pace along the for nearly five and one half furlongs, remained a sharp threat into the stretch and weakened late. COMPLY hopped at the start and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Star Hawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4path backstretch, surged 3 wide, led top lane, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Notary
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5path backstretch, quick move 2w, far turn, headed, fought back

ENTRY.NAME: Comply
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Beer Chaser
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace 2nd turn, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EKATI'S WAY chased the pace into the stretch, drifted to the six path, rallied determinedly under mild right handed urging two wide and was along in time. DIAL DIRECT sped to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. GOLDSTRIKER unhurried early, improved position in the three path into the stretch while well clear for third. REIGNING DREAM well placed, failed to respond. GRAY TORMENTOR hopped at the start and was no threat. DOUBLE AGENT was through early. ITSMYLUCKYPAL was never close.

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Direct
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Double Agent
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Reigning Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Itsmyluckypal
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close

ENTRY.NAME: Goldstriker
ENTRY.OWNER: Donnybrook Stable and Royer Family Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best of rest 3path

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Tormentor
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Ekati's Way
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert Stapleton William Wilkerson Richard and Lucas Robert A
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, drifted 6path top lane, rallied, in time, right urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 12 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXCITEMENT stalked the pace three wide into the stretch, rallied to make the lead two wide inside the furlong marker and drew off under a strong hand ride. OKLAHOMA JOE broke in front, set the pace along the inside until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. BUCKEYE SKY stalked the pace into the stretch, drifted out to the seven path and finished evenly. SWING STATE failed to menace. OHIO STRONG was righted at the start, chased the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. TURNING PAGES was no threat. CHOCOLATE RABBIT was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Rabbit
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Turning Pages
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drifted out lane, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Swing State
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Excitement
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, rallied, late lead 2wide drew off, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: righted start, chased, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Emerald Necklace S. THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 59. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES, TWO-YEAR-OLDS ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS (WHICH REFLECTS $26,250 FROM THE OHIO THOROUGHBRED FUND) FOALED IN THE STATE OF OHIO AS PER THE REQUIREMENTS SET FORTH BY THE OHIO STATE RACING COMMISSION. Nomination fee of $50. $262 to enter with an addit ional $488 to start, with a purse of $75,000, of which 60% to the winner, 20% to second, 10% to third, 5% to fourth, 3% to fifth and 2% to sixth. Weights: 118 lbs. Nominations Close Monday, October 2nd, 2023. Starters to be named through the entry box Mon day, October 9th, 2023. A Trophy will be presented to the Winning Owner. This stake will not split. In the event more than fourteen (14) horses pass the entry box at the time of closing of entries, preference will be given to those horses having accumulat ed the highest 2023 earnings as published by Equibase. Fees to be refunded to excluded horses.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUTHORITARIAN GIRL broke in full stride to set all the pace and widened through the stretch under mild right handed urging to win as much the best. OH GLORIOUS DAY stalked the early pace, moved closer two wide on the turn, drifted to the five path and finished well clear for second. FEELING EASY bobbled at the start and passed tiring rivals in the four path. NANCYFROMTHEBLOCK inside, failed to respond. OFFICE CHATTER pressured the winner along the inside early and weakened on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Nancyfromtheblock
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Office Chatter
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, weakened turn

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Glorious Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 2 wide, clearly second best 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling Easy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, passed tiring rivals, 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Authoritarian Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald James H and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, full of run, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 50. Claiming Purse 21400. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 12 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pri ce $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MERE BAG OF SHELLS pressed the pace three wide through the turn, made the lead entering the stretch, drifted to the eight path and proved best in a stretch long drive while fully extended. I'M JAC'D vied for the lead along the rail, loomed boldly nearing the quarter pole, drifted to the five path and finished second best. CHILLVILLE stalked the pace three wide into the stretch and was outfinished while in the middle of the racetrack. TV TIZ GORGEOUS failed to menace. VILLAGE CAT broke in front, set a pressured pace in the three then two paths and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Jac'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, loomed boldly 1/4 pole, drifted 5parth, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Tv Tiz Gorgeous
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Mere Bag of Shells
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3w, long drive, drifted 8path, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Chillville
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, outfinished mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Village Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, 3-2paths, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 12 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAMMY AND SHORTY stalked the pace through the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead in deep stretch and edged clear under confident handling. LUNCHATTHELIZARD bore out at the start bumping TURBO POWER, set a pressured pace until deep stretch then was clearly second best. ACCURATE close up along the inside, altered course to the six path at the top of the stretch and finished with good courage for a minor share. TURBO POWER was bumped at the start, pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then weakened. NOTHINLASTSFOREVER trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Nothinlastsforever
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy and Shorty
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, late lead, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, altered course 6path, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Lunchatthelizard
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, set pressured pace, clearly second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Turbo Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 18300. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE OCTOBER 12, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 12 Allowe d 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARMEN OHIO trailed into the turn, rallied along the inside to make the lead in deep stretch, drifted out to the six path and won under left handed urging. HIGH CUPPER unhurried early, closed willingly widest through the stretch and got up for second in the eight path. CITY SIGNS rushed to the lead, set the pace until deep stretch, drifted out to the seven path under right handed urging and was outfinished. SHEZA POP STAR pressed the early pace along the inside, dropped back a bit on the turn, came on again outside the leader but was outfinished. COWCHI moved up three wide into the turn then failed to sustain that bid. J J'S FANCY vied for the lead three then two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Carmen Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Royer Family Stables LLC and Aurora Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied inside, drifted 6path, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Pop Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, outfinished 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: City Signs
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drifted out lane, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: High Cupper
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly, 5 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: J J's Fancy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3-2wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Cowchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GAPPER was bumped at the start, allowed to settle, advanced steadily into the stretch, surged late outside and got up in the final strides. WHO DA BOSS pressed the pace two wide for a half, inherited the lead, drifted to the middle of the racetrack, set the balance of the pace then couldn't handle the winner. ROMANIAN PRINCE bore in bumping the winner at the start, stalked the pace and finished evenly in the four path. CANNON MAN was no factor. AFFAIR TO REMEMBER offered a mild bid along the rail nearing the quarter pole then came up empty. NOAH MY BABY rushed to the lead sooon after the start, set the pace for a half then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Noah My Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace half, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Affair to Remember
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Cannon Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gapper
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, unhurried, surged mid track, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Romanian Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, stalked pace, even finish 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Who Da Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, drifted 6path top lane, led, caught
